titles: The excellent comedy called, The old law, or, A new way to please you by Phil. Massinger, Tho. Middleton, William Rowley ... ;  together with an exact and perfect catalogue of all the playes, with the authors names, and what are comedies, tragedies, histories, pastoralls, masks, interludes, more exactly printed than ever before.
author: Massinger, Philip, 1583-1640.
Middleton, Thomas, d. 1627.
Rowley, William, 1585?-1642?
notes: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
